Name: Suspending alternate side parking regulations and meter parking regulations on September 11 of each year.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to suspending alternate side parking regulations and meter parking regulations on September 11 of each year.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Filed (End of Session)

Summary: The administrative code suspends alternate side parking rules for certain holidays and days of national importance. The proposed legislation will add September 11th to that list.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Section 19-163 of the administrative code of city of New York is amended by adding a new subdivision d to read as follows:
      d. The department shall suspend all alternate side of the street parking rules on the eleventh day of September of each year.
      � 2. Subchapter 2 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-163.3 to read as follows:
      � 19-163.3. No parking meter or muni-meter shall be activated on the eleventh day of September of each year.
      � 3. This local law shall take effect immediately upon enactment into law.
